teams.name: In Memory of Shirley
teams.loan_because: We want to honour the memory of a kind, helpful, and generous woman who helped to make the world a better place.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: RESULTS (NC Triangle Chapter & Friends)
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of microfinance!
teams.description:
RESULTS is a nonprofit grassroots advocacy organization committed to creating the political will to end hunger and the worst aspects of poverty. The NC Triangle Chapter (Raleigh, Durham, Chapel Hill) invites everyone from the RESULTS community and beyond to join :)

**Disclaimer: This is an individual initiative by the NC Triangle Chapter, not an initiative by RESULTS.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Lawyers and Law Students Worldwide
teams.loan_because:
We believe everyone deserves an equal opportunity in life. 

Fairness and justice are important to lawyers and law students. We hate to see things that are unfair. It is unfair that some people are born with lots of opportunities while others are born into extreme poverty. 

We lend to try to correct this economic unfairness/injustice. We lend so that people in poverty can have the opportunity to build a good life for themselves and their families.
teams.description: Lawyers and Law Students from around  the World uniting to stop poverty and to give people a 'step up' so that they can help themselves.

teams.name: Students for Kiva
teams.loan_because: We care
teams.description: Students across the world.

teams.description: we share love for tv series and helping people make a better living for themselves :)

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: AllSafe
teams.loan_because:
Our philosophy is both straight forward and simple, yet incredibly powerful. It drives everything we do – from selecting the products and services we offer, to deciding which charities to support.

Community Awareness – AllSafe has the ultimate goal of giving back to the community wherever possible.   AllSafe supports Kiva because it is a community based project, offering assistance, support and shelter, mentoring, counselling and advice to the most underprivileged, needy and vulnerable in our global community.

   
  
Make an enquiry
* Required information.

First Name * 
Surname * 
Phone * 
Email * 
Address 
Suburb 
Post Code * 
State 

Country * 
Comments

How did you find out about us? *
teams.description:
AllSafe Energy Efficient Products aims to deliver solutions and savings to you and the environment through ‘minimizing your carbon footprint.' 

We specialise in a wide variety of energy saving products like insulation, syklights and solar hot-water systems, as well as a range of  solar and wind power generator solutions.

AllSafe Energy Efficient Products is recognized as one of the leading and fastest growing energy efficient product providers in Australia. Whilst many companies offer energy efficient products and services they only offer a small or restricted range – perhaps just insulation, or only solar hot water services. In AllSafe’s view, these are not the “solutions” that consumers demand today and will increasingly demand tomorrow.

AllSafe Energy Efficient Products has a broad range of products and services so it can truly offer energy efficient solutions across the whole of the customer’s home, factory or office.

teams.name: Science Wins Every Time
teams.loan_because: Accident of birthplace should no longer be an impediment to prosperity.
teams.description:
We believe that science is our best tool for learning about the world around us.

We feel that scientific literacy is essential for problem solving in the modern world.

We are thankful for the insights and technologies that the scientific method has produced, and hope that its role in the future of our species will continue to grow.

teams.name: Sverok
teams.loan_because: Många i Sverok känner ett engagemang för sin omvärld och för sina medmänniskor!
teams.description: Vi är medlemmar i Sverok, Sveriges största ungdomsförbund.

teams.name: Windstar Cruises
teams.loan_because: Windstar Cruises supports KIVA's work in alleviating poverty through  small business micro-lending. We invite past and future Windstar  guests to connect through our team and join us in supporting this worthwhile cause to help end poverty in developing countries.
teams.description: Windstar Cruises operates three sailing yachts (Wind Spirit, Wind Star, Wind Surf) known for their pampering without pretense and their ability to visit the hidden harbors and secluded coves of the world’s most treasured destinations.  Carrying just 148 to 312 guests, the luxurious ships of Windstar cruise to nearly 50 nations, calling at 100 ports throughout Europe, the Caribbean and the Americas. For more information including brochures, rates and itineraries contact a professional travel agent or call Windstar at 1-800-258-7245. Visit Windstar Cruises online at www.windstarcruises.com.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Ireland
teams.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.
teams.description: A group of Kiva Lenders from Ireland, or with links to Ireland. Feel free to join our community :)

teams.name: Beoga
teams.loan_because: We can

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Cantabria 2.0
teams.description: Internautas cántabros con ganas de ayudar a gente que tiene ganas de ayudarse

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: team tali
teams.loan_because: we want to give people a chance to succeed.
teams.description: a group of kids and parents that feel we can make the world a better place.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: GREENbay by Olympia
teams.loan_because: GREENbay is our token to affection for the planet we share. Because it´s better to live than to be lived. Because it´s better to have fun than to be annoyed. Because it´s better to get on with each other than to fight over nothing
teams.description: We´re a young brand and  we love good ideas all over the world, quite the same wether they´re big or small.
